import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("../data/our_df2.csv")

# ì¡°ê±´ í•„í„°ë§
final_candidates = df[
    (df['dist_to_ISU'] <= 2000) &
    (df['BedroomAbvGr'] >= 3) &
    (df['TotalFullBath'] >= 2) &
    (df['GarageCars'] > 0) &
    (df['HouseStyle'] == 2) &
    (df['CentralAir'] == 'Y') &
    (df['HeatingQC'].isin(['Ex', 'Gd', 'TA'])) &
    (df['KitchenAbvGr'] >= 1) &
    (df['KitchenQual'].isin(['Ex', 'Gd', 'TA'])) &
    (df['Street'] == 'Pave')
]

# ì ìˆ˜ ê¸°ì¤€ ì •ë ¬

    by=['OverallCond', 'GarageArea', 'TotalFullBath'],
